alert.note: Alert for Delta; Dickinson (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 01 at 4:33AM EDT until May 02 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EDT /1 AM CDT/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches, greatest across the northern halves of Dickinson and Delta counties. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Dickinson and Delta Counties. * WHEN...Until 2 AM EDT /1 AM CDT/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Travel could be difficult in some areas due to the slushy snow accumulations on roads. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes today. With wet snow collecting on trees and powerlines, the strong may cause some tree damage and sporadic power outages. The snow will be difficult to move.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
